name: Sleeping With Sakuya Izayoi
storyline: In this small visual novel, your partner Sakuya Izayoi is tired after a long day of working at the Scarlet Devil Mansion, she invites you to relax with her in her private quarters! Talk to her, kiss her or just simply enjoy each other's presence.
summary: In this small visual novel, lay down and relax with Sakuya Izayoi. Talk to her, kiss her or just simply enjoy each other's presence! Chose between 3 different locations featuring stunning artwork in this Touhou Project Fangame.
